content.description: A bit of an eliminate, start with feet on the belay ledge sized hold at the base of the wall, left hand on the side pulling crimp, and right hand on an undercling. Follow a variety of small crimps to a good ledge before a committing topout. Avoid the broken features on the right arete.
content.location: Near the center of the Pony Barricade wall in between two large trees. Finishes on the same ledge as Pegasus Was A Pony (V1).

content.description: Start left hand on a good sidepull, right hand on the arete. Work your way up the easy, but somewhat broken arete through a variety of holds.
content.location: Directly right of Shetland (V3), behind the tree.

content.description: Start matched on two crimps at about chest height and work you way up the face, topping out on the ledge. Downclimb the dirty dihedral to get down.
content.location: On the left side of Pony Barricade, opposite of Exotic Evangelical Equestrian (V2).

content.description: Start on left hand side pull and right hand pinch. Climb through a few good holds before encounter a cruxy sloper for your left hand just before the outro. Avoid using the obviously detached feature down low to the right.
content.location: A tall feature on the left side of Pony Barricade. Located directly across from Pegasus Was A Pony (V1).

content.description: Start right hand on the Arete, left hand on a small sidepull. Use either Arete and a variety of face holds to work your way up. Avoid the feature left of the crack.
content.location: Left side on the Pony Barricade wall, on the upper tier and opposite side of Exotic Evangelical Equestrian (V2).

content.description: Located directly above Horse Rampart lies a slightly smaller wall that hosts a number of boulders near the base and a some roped climbs scattered throughout.
